glosses: to face, view, watch, have a sight of
to examine, investigate, pay attention to, have a look
to take care of, look after
to attend to, tend to, see to, mind

etymology: Inherited from Ottoman Turkish باقمق (bakmak, “to look”), from Proto-Turkic *bak- (“to look, watch”). Cognate to Azerbaijani baxmaq (“to look”) and Karakhanid بَقْماقْ (baqmāq).
